name: Prompt Engineer Competency
description: Complete prompt engineering competency package aggregating all prompt creation, testing, conversion, and documentation capabilities with templates and best practices

index_metadata.description_short: Prompt engineering: create, test, convert, and optimize LLM prompts

author: OLAF Framework

classification.reason: Core framework functionality essential for all prompt engineering and workflow design operations

target_users.description: Prompt engineers designing and testing LLM prompts, developers integrating prompting into workflows, project managers coordinating workflow automation

entry_points.description: Create new structured prompts following OLAF template and best practices
entry_points.name: Create Prompt
entry_points.use_case: Create new structured prompts following OLAF template and best practices

entry_points.description: Convert existing prompts to OLAF template structure
entry_points.name: Convert Prompt
entry_points.use_case: Convert existing prompts to OLAF template structure

entry_points.description: Check and validate prompts for template compliance and effectiveness
entry_points.name: Check Prompt Compliance
entry_points.use_case: Check and validate prompts for template compliance and effectiveness

entry_points.description: Generate step-by-step tutorials from workflows or conversations
entry_points.name: Generate Tutorial
entry_points.use_case: Generate step-by-step tutorials from workflows or conversations

entry_points.description: Condense OLAF framework while maintaining functionality
entry_points.name: Condense Framework
entry_points.use_case: Condense OLAF framework while maintaining functionality

entry_points.description: Generate structured workflows from templates or specifications
entry_points.name: Generate Workflow
entry_points.use_case: Generate structured workflows from templates or specifications

entry_points.description: Package prompts, scripts, and templates into self-contained OLAF competency packages

entry_points.description: Select an OLAF competency collection and update the framework accordingly
entry_points.name: Select Competency Collection
entry_points.use_case: Select an OLAF competency collection and update the framework accordingly

entry_points.description: Analyze external prompts collection and generate mapping recommendations for OLAF competency integration (Phase 1 - Analysis)
entry_points.name: Import Prompts To Competency
entry_points.use_case: Analyze external prompts collection and generate mapping recommendations for OLAF competency integration (Phase 1 - Analysis)

entry_points.description: Convert and deploy external prompts to OLAF competencies following approved mapping plan (Phase 2 - Implementation)
entry_points.name: Deploy Imported Prompts
entry_points.use_case: Convert and deploy external prompts to OLAF competencies following approved mapping plan (Phase 2 - Implementation)

templates.description: Best practices and principles for prompt engineering

scripts.name: Competency Collection Selector
scripts.description: End-user tool to select competency collections and generate personalized competency index

scripts.name: Competency Collection Manager
scripts.description: Administrator tool to create, edit, and manage competency collections

tools.name: Competency Collection System
tools.description: Complete Python-based system for managing and selecting competency collections based on user persona or team needs

capabilities: Create structured prompts following established template and principles
Convert existing prompts to follow template structure
Analyze and test existing prompts for compliance and effectiveness
Generate step-by-step tutorials from workflows or conversations
Condense OLAF framework reference files while maintaining functionality
Create structured workflows from templates or specifications

examples.name: Creating a New Prompt
examples.description: Complete walkthrough of creating a new structured prompt with validation and testing

examples.name: Prompt Conversion Workflow
examples.description: Example of converting legacy prompts to new template structure

changes: Initial release of complete prompt-engineer competency package
Aggregated all prompt creation and manipulation prompts
Added best practices and principles documentation
